alert.note: Alert for Christian (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 4:32AM CDT until further notice by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Missouri, including the following counties, Christian and Stone. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 431 AM CDT, The Department of Transportation reported flooding from previous heavy rain in the warned area. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following low water crossings... Bull Creek at Center Road, Swan Creek at Swan Cave Road, Woods Fork at Woods Fork Road, Finley River at Johns Ford Road, Tin Can Hollow at Highway CC, Silver Lake Branch at Highway U and Tory Creek at Highway O. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Ozark, Highlandville, Sparta, Crane, Galena, Mccord Bend, Spokane, Chestnutridge, Selmore, Christian Center, Ponce de Leon, Chadwick, Oldfield, Garrison, Bruner, Elsey, Keltner, Cape Fair, Elkhead and Table Rock Lake. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles.
